original_text: And when he was in affliction, he besought the Lord his God, and humbled himself greatly before the God of his fathers,
korean_text: 그가 환난을 당하여 그의 하나님 여호와께 간구하고 그의 조상들의 하나님 앞에 크게 겸손하여

sentences.original_text: And when he was in affliction,
he besought the Lord his God,
before the God of his fathers,
